Documentation: The unique ID of this picking order.
Sample RecordTypeTag.createNonModeled(...) with documentation text
Is the unique identification of a client.
Is a part of the unique identification of an item.
The variant is the most precise description of an item. With the help of the variant, e.g. colours or sizes of clothing can be specified. Is a part of the unique identification of an item.
Since an item can have several packaging versions, the id is used to distinguish them.
Unique identification of a partner object.
Unique identification of a stock rating object.
The best before date indicates the length of time goods (e.g. food) are at least non-perishable if stored properly.

The total amount of goods of an article produced in a certain clearly documented production process.Normally, the batch is identified by the batch number. The total amount of goods of an item produced in a certain clearly documented production process.
The production date defines the date on which the product was manufactured.

Through reservations the stock is divided into free and reserved stock. The reservation number defines the purpose of the stock.Special offers (!= Promotional products)Pre-sales...Reserved stock gets a reservation number during goods in processing. A delivery can only be carried out with reference to an existing reservation number.
The cross docking number identifies goods for cross docking.

The item quantity specification in its administration unit (base quantity unit). All state calculations, delivery fulfilled checks and so on are based on the base quantity. The dual quantity has no effect for those calculations.

Lower tolerance in percentage.

UPDATE (Default value, if picking order line exists then update is required, else new picking order line is created), CANCEL (WMS request canceling for picking order line (WCS skips any picking activity if possible))
